article: Peter and I are good friends. Peter is an English boy. I am a Chinese boy. My name is Li Chen. I am 12 and Peter is 12, too. We are in the same class. Peter has a blue pencil box and five black pens. I have two yellow erasers and two red pens. Peter found an ID card in the library. If you lost it, please go and ask Mrs. Brown----our English teacher for it. Her telephone number is 786-2360. I lost my English-English dictionary in Class 2. It's red. My name is on it. If you find it, please call me. My phone number is 342-7256. Thank you very much.
questions: Peter and Li Chen have _ pens.
Tony lost his ID card in the library. Who can he go to ask?
